external_games.name: Strings of Fate XI: Magic Dream
Strings of Fate XI: Magic dream

name: Strings of Fate XI: Magic Dream
storyline:
You need to play as a party of five characters, gathered by fate to complete a great mission - saving the planet from Ancient Evil!
An ancient evil has awakened and is ready to emerge from its imprisonment. The heroes of the game will have to deal with mysterious dreams that invade their lives. These dreams not only prevent them from sleeping, but also affect their actions in everyday life. Gradually, the dreams become more and more intrusive, and the heroes realize that they must understand their nature. But to do this, they will have to go through many trials, unravel ancient secrets, confront powerful enemies, cultivate strength, save their souls and protect the World.
summary: Strings of Fate XI: A Magic Dream is an attempt to create a new fantasy world of adventure for fans of the RPG genre. Using the Unreal Engine, the game world will be presented in a colorful way with already familiar graphics technologies and mechanics.
